summary: Fixed login issue - Frontend was calling localhost:8001 instead of preview URL. Updated env-config.js to use correct backend URL. Login with admin1/123456 now works correctly.

root_cause.issue: Frontend env-config.js had hardcoded http://localhost:8001 as REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL

critical_code_review_comments: The env-config.js file in /app/frontend/public/ should be dynamically generated or use environment variables properly in development mode
Consider using a build-time replacement or ensuring the start.sh script also updates the public folder for dev mode
context_for_next_testing_agent: Login is now working. The fix was in /app/frontend/public/env-config.js - changed REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL from http://localhost:8001 to https://vessel-manager-5.preview.emergentagent.com. All auth API tests pass.
